reviews.review:
이제는 고일대로 고여 살인마가 생존자를 농락하거나 생존자가 살인마를 농락하는 게임이다.
살인마1   생존자4 이렇게 총 5명이 모여서 게임을 시작하는데 생존자는 생존자끼리 모여서 발전기를 5개열고 닫힌문을 열어서 탈출하는게 목적이고 살인마는 생존자를 다 때려잡아서 죽이지않고 귀찮게 갈고리에 걸어둬서 이상한 거미다리같은놈들이 생존자를 죽이게 만드는게 목적이다. 생존자는 4명끼리 뭉쳐야하는데 자기들끼리만 살려고하거나 점수가낳은 괴물이거나 둘중하나이다.
점수는 등급을 올리는데 중요하다. 여기는 일반전이 없고 그냥 바로 등급전이기 때문에 점낳괴가 될 수 밖에 없긴하다.
살인마는 능력이 제각각인 캐릭터를 골라 할 수 있고 능력이 마음에 드는 살인마를 골라 플레이 하면 된다.
공포적인 요소도 있지만 개그요소가 많은 게임이다.

伤心了
I'm glad i put money on this game and put a lot of hours on this game just to have all my progress reset with not explaination as to why. thank you for wasting my time on this game
Funny game... buggy but fun to play

To begin with this game, I'll start with its grade : Throw/20

This game in itself isn't bad. I'd say it's quite good, and I will list it's best points :

+Vibes : This game is really oppressive. Your heart will make you quiver when the killer approaches.
+ DAMMIT, you can brain the killer, you can ouplay the killer. This could be a mindgame (Theory)
+ Graphically, it's quite good, and the characters are interesting. 

Mostly, the game itself is fairly good. 

Not a complicated reciepe, even if it could be a good one. But now, time for the cons :

- Matchmaking : Yeah, a game will lasts 5 minutes (for some points explained under), and you will be waiting for it like for 15 mins. 
- CAAAAAAAMPEEERS : Yep, most of the killer camp, now you can't save your mates, who will flame you for it. hf guys.
- CHEAAATEEEERS :  Oh, you are hiding ? the killer has a scan anyways. Oh, he can"t beat you trough this barrel ? Np, he can reach you easily, this wall isn't enough because cheats are everywhere. Oh you are far, you can escape ? Nope, he will run faster than Bolt on a 100m race. Well, if you don't cheat, you can't win, it's easy.

Dead by daylight is a sweet cake, which looks like great. You would eat it isn"t it ? Problem, it has been filled with sh*t.

While this game can be fun and is enjoyable with friends, it can be really unbalanced and not fun to play against unbalanced items and perks. In general it is a good concept and a solid cooperative game but is unbalanced by how insane some of the items and perks are. Also there are killers that are considerably better (IMO myers, doctor, and sometimes the hag) than the others simply because you have to buy them. Camping isn't really punished very well and the game can be quite frustrating.

5/10
-it can be fun if you get a relatively even game, or you are playing with friends
-suffers from campers, unbalanced items and perks, along with lag and glitches

edit:The problem with camping isn't that the killer himself isn't punished, it's that the people who get camped don't have any fun at all and that's isn't how games should work, it should be fun for both sides. Noob killers don't know that camping is bad, they just do it.
p.s. I would like to rate this a good game but till they fix a couple of things I hold my opinion

To start with, I absolutely loved the game, up until it completely wiped 85 hours of gameplay from my account for absolutely no reason.

That said, this was 85 hours, which included the triple bloodpoint bonus event, so in total, the amount of bloodpoints that I invested into my killers is more around the lines of 120+ hours

After having all of my progress wiped, and all my killers reverted back to level 1, and losing all prestige, I proceeded to brows the forums for my next step in order to have them restore the progress that I had worked for - Sadly the only thing I was able to find was a thread stating that I needed to e-mail all of my revelant account info to their support address, and present screen shots as proof, and they would get back to me.

It has been just shy of a month since I sent them the first e-mail, having sent the same mail every single day for the past three weeks, and I have yet to receive so much as an aknowledgement receipt that they received my mail, and would restore my progress in due time, but instead I have not heard a word from this developer, and with very limited methods of contact with them, I fear that all of the time that I have invested in this game, that I so enjoyed, has sadly gone to waste, and will not be restored, since their support team cannot care less about their fan base losing over a hundred hours of progress, and the fact that saved data isn't even backed up to their servers in this day and age is absolutely ridiculous given the digital age that we are in, yet apparently the only copy of your saved data is on your local machine, and should that get "accidently overwriten" by the game, your progress is lost, and you are forced to send mail after mail after mail in hopes that one day, this developer will respond and restore what you worked endless hours for.

Based on this experience alone, in a game that promotes progress so much, that it's the pure driving force behind advancing your characters, yet your progress can be lost in the blink of an eye due to bad programming, and no digital backups of your save data - I would not reccomend this game to anyone if you have any hopes about progression in the long run, since hundreds of hours of progress can dissapear just like that, and getting it back is a lost cause.

*Edit - After waiting roughly six weeks, I was finally re-imbursed for the blood points that I lost, however I would have liked to see further compensation for the lengthy wait. Hopefully the developer will fix this issue somewhere down the line, so that we do not have to revert to 1995 methods of manually backing up saved games."
dead by daylight is very good game.  thx, gmaemaker and engineers.
An awful game that I keep playing just because im addicted. Thanks Behavior
JuegaxXxo

Ok I now have almost 100 hours in this game and feel like this is a good time to give my review. Firstly, this game is great fun with friends. If you have 4 friends or less then you can play Kill with your friends and take it in turn being killer, which is very fun. The survive with friends option is also great fun, but only when it works! Half the time it takes over 5 min to find a game or when you do find a game the game might kick you out of the lobby anyway. It is also bad that if the killer disconnects straight away and you escape then you never get enough blood points and will actually derank from escaping, which makes no sense and should not be possible. Overall, it is definitely worth the money for this game and improvements are steadily being made.

Das Spiel ist in Ordnung, das größte Problem sind Mitspieler, die nicht nachdenken (z.B. jemanden abhängen wollen, obwohl der Killer direkt bei ihnen ist), die das Spiel sofort verlassen, wenn sie an den Haken gehängt werden und Camper.
Änderung am 12.09.2017: Das Spiel laggt immer mehr, die Verbindungsabbrüche in den Lobbie häufen sich und Camping nimmt immer weiter zu. Ich empfinde dieses Spiel immer mehr als Ärgernis.

最开始买游戏的时候还挺好，直到上次更新，人类技能削弱，地图板子少了一半，窗子封了许多，基本遇到屠夫就躺，晚上和小伙伴开黑经常半个小时左右才能开一局（是配备到人到进图），现在这个屠夫强到惊天的版本，遇到的屠夫不是看见四个人类进房间秒准备了就退，就是进去了轻松四趴，一拖三＋恶咒毁灭基本修不动电机，偶尔在遇到个一斧刀，一夹刀，那什么玩？现版本稍微会玩一点的屠夫就能砍得人皇不要不要的。关键最近人类拔线率极高，以上几点我只能说现版本人类游戏体验极差！！！！
排不到人，是真的，我，什么服务器，排人基本十分钟，

Забанили больше месяца назад. Из-за моих сомнений, что бан был правомерный, написал разработчикам на почту. Через 5 дней ответили, что для того, чтобы ОГЛАСИТЬ ПРИЧИНУ МОЕГО БАНА, им понадобится 2 НЕДЕЛИ, КАРЛ!... Прошло две недели-ответа нет... Прошел месяц-ответа все еще нет. Написал им напоминание, что я еще существую, и не отошел в мир иной... Ответа так и не последовало. Даже какой-то там EAC(Easy anti-cheat) написал ответ в течении двух дней, что бан был от самого разработчика напрямую, но, видите-ли, Behavior плюет на всякую чернь вроде меня, и не намерена этой черни обьяснить причину блокировки. Я уже молчу о том, что заявки на восстановление прогресса они рассматривают МЕСЯЦ.
Ну и, чтобы рецензия была не только про саппорт и самого разработчика, но и про игру, вспомните:
-Долгие ожидания при поиске лобби
-Какой интересный был баг с паллетами, когда был релиз охотницы
-Некоторые окна до сих пор не блокируются как подобает после двух прыжков в него, и в этой игре до сих пор есть инфиниты(пример: красный амбар в полях)
-Сохранения не хватает мозгов сколько уже времени перенести на сервера, чтобы не тратить кучу времени, возвращая людям их прогресс

如果你玩完没有正常退出游戏进行云同步，这个游戏的云储存就没了，是的！云储存跟没有一样！
游戏的存档机制跟SHIT一样，如果你能保证每次玩游戏不会断网，正常退出游戏进行同步，那么你将不会有任何问题，如果你哪怕游戏中断网一次，好了，你可以对你的存档说再见了！
你的存档没了，发邮件给官方，除了自动回复的邮件以外，你就不要抱有侥幸心理觉得官方会理你，因为那是不！可！能！的！

アップデートの度に増えるバグ、劣化するバランス、改善されない切断率、プレイヤーを煽る運営･･･良いゲームではありましたが、ではこれから買うべきかと言うとオススメは出来ません

質問: Playing killer is stressful and unfun now. Any plans for balance changes?
運営: Go play civilization if you don't like playing killer right now

現状、殺人鬼は生存者達にゲーム中に煽られ、チャットでも煽られ、アップデートごとに弱体化され、高ランクに行くほど殺人鬼不足でマッチングしづらい状況となっています。
その中で「殺人鬼が楽しくないならシヴィライゼーションでもプレイしてろ」と言い放つ運営。御存知の通り、シヴィライゼーションは文明発展シミュレーション。ジャンルは全然違います。運営はホラーゲームも対戦アクションゲームも興味が無いのでしょう。

殺人鬼が生存者に近づくと心音が大きくなり、それを頼りに物陰への退避行動を取るのですが、その心音が距離に関係なく鳴り響くバグがありました。ゲームシステムを根底から覆すものです。これは毎試合発生するもので、一度でもテストプレイすればすぐに気がつくはずです。それすらも修正に数日を要しました。

試合中の切断も多いですが、未だに何の対策も取られていません。ゲーム自体は楽しい･･･楽しかったのですが、少なくとも現時点で購入し新規プレイするべきものではありません。購入する前に直近のレビューを読み、5chの本スレの荒れ具合を確認してから決断して下さい。
Хорошая игра как по мне, здорово играется в кругу друзей) Динамичная и не даст заскучать) Особенно интересно играть с друзьями и на более высоких рангах) Странно, что до сих пор не надоедает)

Dead By Daylight is a very addictive game. Whenever I play I almost always die but when I survive, I feel so alive! This game does an amazing job of keeping everything interesting! The only problem I have is that the DLC is not in a bundle.

Edit: When I first wrote this review I had only 17 hours of experience. Now I have over 600. This game is addicting as ever, with new Killers and Survivors to master coming out every 3 months, the challenges and the battle-pass, before all of these the game felt boring after a time, but because of these things there is only more reason to play!

To all those that say this game is broken, that it is unfair and full of bugs, you are right. Those problems have been here since the beginning. I recommended Dead By Daylight then and I still do now.

Dead By Daylight is a very, very awesome game, however it does have a lot of ups and downs.
If you get frustrated VERY easily, and are a really, REALLY bad loser, you'll hate this game very quick, I'll list the reasons why.
(Some things I will mention might spoil the way to play so BEWARE alright?)

PROS:
- AMAZING movement! The moving of camera is really good and you can easilly find your way around
- Amazingly different perks for each character you choose to play as
- You can be a full 'team-and-heal'-player, or the more 'I'll help but I'll leave quick too'-player
- It's super intense when the killer is after you, and when you stun them you feel downright AWESOME
- When you get a really good killer, they are the fucking best, praise the shit outta them
- It's really nice to play with your soul mate(lover or whatever u like to call IT), hell fucking yes it's the BEST team
- The graphics are AMAZING, the characters are creative, that being both killers and survivers
- Some glitches but they are pretty darn funny when you find them
- Every map is in 'the same area' depending on what map it is, but is totally different so you can always end up surprised

CONS:
- Toxic cummunity
- Killer's that wont play by the rules camp you so that other people can't get near you and then you DIE
- If a killer camps you and you call them out for it, they'll be so rude you wish you stayed in your mom's womb
- More toxic community, 'cause damn, it is TOXIC
- Really, the REAL 'killer' of this game(see what I did there?) is the community, they will come and shit on you, so seriously, beware

The game is cool though, and with really good friends it can be a wonder to play. If you have never played it before, I SERIOUSLY recommend playing with your friends through 'training' rounds, it's an option where you 'can kill your friends'. It's sickly good for practice and better than just jumping right into the game and ending up getting a shitty killer or two survivors who lost connection to the server.

AT LAST; A word of advice, IF you are dealing with a camper killer, signal the other's by waving your arms(attempt to escape but don't go through with it) to tell them to stay away, or tell them before the game starts that if a killer camps you they should just work on the generators, because the killer is losing a sick amount of precious time guarding your hanging, dying body.

Oh, and lastly:
The Doctor sucks, fuck the Doctor.

DATA RECENZIEI: 17.04.2019

Salut !

Informații POZITIVE:

- gameplay atractiv și distractiv.
- grafica foarte plăcută.
- foarte mult conținut.
- îi destul de echilibrate meciurile.

Informații NEGATIVE:

- scârțâie tare la optimizare.
- frățică ... atâtea crush-uri ... băăăăăăăăăăăăăă', la 2 meciuri bune, unul se duce din cauza crush-ului.
- comunitatea ... vai de capul meu ... s-o stricat în 6 luni mai rău ca aia din CS. Cu asta cred că am zis aproape tot. Îți place cearta fară rost, nicio problemă, ai aici jocul perfect.
- să luăm partea bună ... avem la haine cu nemuluita ... avem câte 3-4 kill-ări și survivals pe an ... dar optimizarea merge tot mai rău. Înainte, dacă vroiai să joci cu totul la maxim aveai nevoie de cel puțin 16 RAM, acum cu 16 RAM merge ca penisul pe medium. -_-

NOTE:

Gameplay: 100/100
Grafică: 100/100
Conținut: 100/100
Comunitatea: 50/100

Nota finală: 8,75

Un sfat, nu-l cumpăra. Îi pe moarte jocul.

Mersi de atenție, pace !

Hah pamiętam jak przez pierwszy mieśiąć grałem w dbd nic nie rozumiałem uczyłem sie dopiero nie wiedziałem jak punkty rozdać i milion zdobyłem czyłem ten drzeszczyk emocji nawet na początku ta gra miała minusy ale pomyślałem przećież dopiero ją wypuścili mają czas no troche czasu mineło gra sie skurwiła chociaż nie od początku była chujowa bo nic nie robią tylko nowe mapy zabójcy surv co 3 miechy nie polecam wogóle jakiś gówno zasrane jeszcze taka cena w pizdu droga a jak teraz by sie chciało pograć to niczym będziesz po 1000 dodatków wyszło  kurwa kto normalny dodaje takie perki że posiedzisz w szafie 8 s i uleczony jpdl jakieś totalne bezmózgowie no  i kurwa looperzy japierdole najgorsze naśieńie przećież tak nie idzie grać a propo grania to na mecz kilerem muśisz czekać wiecznośc kurwa w południe nie da rady 20 minut czekasz aż ci mecz znajdzie a sam mecz trwa 7 min często przy (genrush)ale około 19 i w nocy to magia nagle wyszukuje w pól sekundy co to za gra ja sie pytam jak tylko wieczorem można pograć przećież to absurd Musze też wspomnieć o innym błędzie który mnie dotyczy chyba tylko mnie m1 m2 zjebane nie odbiera czasami klikasz nie działa jak chce to może odbierze rozjebałem 4 myszki ale to nie wina sprzetu tylko gry mam  już 2 komputer fakty autentyczne naprawde kompa musiałem kupic bo tamten był brata ale to inna sprawa no i chuj nadal mi przerywa myszka lepiej przeznaczyć te pieniądze na coś bardziej pożytecznego niech was MegaWąż(9) od tego strzerze bo to najgorzej zmarnowane pieniądze i mój czas a zabójcy dostają buffa na początku jak jest dlc nowe mija mieśiać nerf i tak właśnie działa dbd najpierw pokazać że sztos zabójca pózniej znerfic żeby hajs wydoić szkoda szczmpić

少し遊んで見て、煽ってくる大半が韓国人というゲームです。
ゲーム自体は面白いので、煽られるのが平気という方にはオススメします。
煽られるのは嫌だという方にはあまりオススメできません。非常に苛立ちます。

Зашёл после патча ранговой системы, и что я вижу ? Сурвы 1000+ часов КАЖДУЮ катку! (у меня ток 400 часов) Так ладно бы просто играли, нет тебя унизят и в чате и в игре играя в пати! И где баланс обещанный ? 
Раньше тебе кидали 1 ну редко 2 игроков с красными эмблема (ещё реже пати людей что ни чинят гины а просто бегают с фанариками) у тебя был шанс! А сейчас тебе пожелают сдохнуть все в пати если хотя бы 1 чел проиграл, и унизят за проёб первым рангам! 
Хорора в этой игре нет! Если играешь за мана ты не играешь, ты страдаешь! За сурва у тебя долбоёбы что сдохнут в начале и обольют тебя говном!
Dead by Daylight самая крутая игра, где можно играть как за выживших, так и за маньяка!!! СОВЕТУЮ!!!
nice

It is a really fun game. I have accumualted alot of hours on this game. I have almost 1 character to lvl 50 now and almost none of my survivors are below lvl 10. So, I can say that this game is really fun. Has alot of replay value. Just I hate campers and I wish there was something to prevent camping like that.
